text: Maria Kowalska (born 19 May 1929) is a Polish alpine skier. She competed at the 1952 Winter Olympics and the 1956 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:Living people Category:Polish female alpine skiers Category:Olympic alpine skiers of Poland Category:Alpine skiers at the 1952 Winter Olympics Category:Alpine skiers at the 1956 Winter Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Zakopane
title: Maria Kowalska
